src:
Apple kräver att Trump tar bort importtullar på Airpods
Teknikjätten Apple ber Trump-administrationen att lyfta importtullarna på flera produkter som tillverkas i Kina. Det avslöjar handlingar som bolaget skickat in till det amerikanska handelsdepartementet, skriver Reuters.
01 Nov 2019, 18:53 by Victor Hultgren

text:
Apple requires Trump to remove import duties on Airpods
Technology giant Apple is asking the Trump administration to lift import duties on several products manufactured in China. It reveals documents that the company sent to the US Department of Commerce, Reuters writes.
01 Nov 2019, 18:53 by Victor Hultgren
